item.title: Testing WebAPI with ApprovalTests.NET
item.description: In this blog post, I’m going to share my experience on testing ASP.NET Core applications by applying an unconventional method called snapshot assertions. In comparison to the classical approach, this method should save you a lot of time and improve assertions maintainability.
